name: Mark Edgery
description: some qualities you will find in me . i’m a good looking man, who dresses neatly, and i would love to build a relationship where the respect goes both ways. a gentleman since birth, i’m note quite shy, but m also not too forward. I’m looking for someone to go dancing with, to taste new wines, and enjoy the finer things in life.& celebrating special occasions. I’m self-sufficient, independent, honest, i have a great sense of humor, & family & friends are very important to me. a woman who only has has eyes for me & can make me laugh are important
